results.definition: twining perennials having cordate leaves and flowers arranged in conelike spikes; the dried flowers of this plant are used in brewing to add the characteristic bitter taste to beer
an informal dance where popular music is played
make a jump forward or upward
move quickly from one place to another
the act of hopping; jumping upward or forward (especially on one foot)
travel by means of an aircraft, bus, etc.
examples: She hopped a train to Chicago
He hopped rides all over the country

results.definition: traverse as if by a short airplane trip
